Class CommandFactoryTest

Namespace
ASE_Assignment_Test_Case
Assembly
ASE_Assignment_Test_Case.dll

Unit tests for the StoredCommandFactory class. Ensures that the MakeCommand method correctly creates instances of commands and handles invalid inputs appropriately.

[TestClass]
public class CommandFactoryTest

object

SetUp()

Initializes the test by creating a new instance of StoredCommandFactory. This method is executed before each test method runs.
